All Classes

Class Description
Action
Interface representing any model-changing action in the game.
ActionToken
this enumeration represents all possible types of action token
ActionTokenDeck
Deck of action tokens used in a single player game.
ActionTokenDeckTest
Tests ActionTokenDeck behavior, all tests refer to getFullDeck for checks.
ActionTokenUpdate
This class contains an updated version of the ActionTokenDeck which will be saved in the local DumbModel
ActivateLeaderCardAction
This class represents the action of activating a LeaderCard chosen by a Player
ActivateLeaderCardActionTest  
ActivateProductionAction
This class represents the action of activating a Production chosen by a Player
ActivateProductionActionTest  
AssignInkwellAction
Class representing the assignment of the Inkwell marker and consequent move order for all players.
AssignInkwellActionTest  
AuthenticationMessage
This class represents a message sent by the client to authenticate himself with the server
AuthenticationRequest
This class represent a request sent by the server.
AuthenticationState  
BroadcastRenderable
Renderable items that get shown to all players on change.
BuyDevelopmentCardAction
This class represents the action of purchasing a DevelopmentCard
BuyDevelopmentCardActionTest  
ChangesHandler
Class which handles Model changes, publishing them to its subscribed RemoteView and writing them to disk when needed.
ChangesHandlerTest  
CLI
This is the CLI client for the game, mainly handles pregame activity, input reading and visualization
ClientSocket
This class contains the client-side socket used to communicate with the server
Color
this enumeration represents possible colors of Development Cards
CommandExecutor
This class has the goal of parsing commands and verifying their validity, if valid it also forwards them to server
CommandHelpException
This Exception is thrown when user wants to see help for a specific command
Commands
This class contains a set of commands which can be selected by the user when playing on the CLI
CommonsException
This Exception is used as a gimmick to communicate CLI that it should display commons
ConfirmationMessage
Generic confirmation message sent to client when the received action is legitimate
ConfirmationMessageType
Contains various types of actions which can be sent by user and might be valid
ConfirmResetButtonsStrategy
Enum used as strategy pattern for confirmation and reset buttons in GUI controllers.
ConnectFooterController
JFX Footer controller which handles connection to a server.
Connection  
ConnectionState  
Constants
This class contains a set of constants (messages, ascii escape codes, ascii arts, etc.) used to make a nicer CLI
Controller
Handles game related logic via Action legality checks and execution.
ControllerTest  
ConvertLeaderCard
Leader Card which is able to convert white marbles to its convertedResource type.
CreateLobbyMessage
This class represents a message sent by the client when the server asks the client to create a new game
CreateLobbyRequest
This class represent a request sent by the server.
DealLeaderCardsAction
Class representing the act of dealing 4 leader cards to each player, giving each one of them the ability to pick 2 out of the 4.
DealLeaderCardsActionTest  
DefaultSlot  
DepotsUpdate
This class contains an updated version of a player's depots which will be saved in the local DumbModel
DevelopmentCard
Card which can be placed in development card slots and used to convert the required input resource into the fixed output resources.
DevelopmentCardsBoard
3 rows-4 columns grid of Development card from which all players can purchase cards during a match.
DevelopmentCardsBoardTest  
DevelopmentCardsBoardUpdate
This class contains an updated version of DevelopmentCardsBoard which will be saved in the local DumbModel
DevelopmentCardsDeck
Deck of Development cards.
DevelopmentCardsDeckTest  
DevelopmentCardSlot  
DevelopmentCardSlotUpdate
This class contains an updated version of a player's DevelopmentCardSlot which will be saved in the local DumbModel
DevelopmentCardTest  
DiscardLeaderCardAction
This class represents the action of discarding a LeaderCard chosen by a Player
DiscardLeaderCardActionTest  
DiscountLeaderCard
Leader Card which reduces the price of Development Cards.
DumbConvertLeaderCard
This is a dumber version of a regular ConvertLeaderCard, this class only contains the data stored in a ConvertLeaderCard but has none of its logic.
DumbDevelopmentCard
This is a dumber version of a regular DevelopmentCard, this class only contains the data stored in a DevelopmentCard but has none of its logic.
DumbDevelopmentCardsBoard
This is a dumber version of a regular DevelopmentCardsBoard, this class only contains the top layer of the cards contained in the DevelopmentCardsBoard on the server.
DumbDevelopmentCardSlot
This is a dumber version of a regular DevelopmentCardSlot, this class only contains the data stored in a DevelopmentCardSlot but has none of its logic.
DumbDiscountLeaderCard
This is a dumber version of a regular DiscountLeaderCard, this class only contains the data stored in a DiscountLeaderCard but has none of its logic.
DumbFaithTrack
This is a dumber version of a regular FaithTrack, this class only contains data contained in a FaithTrack but has none of its logic.
DumbLeaderCard
This is a dumber version of a regular LeaderCard, this class only contains the data stored in a LeaderCard but has none of its logic.
DumbMarket
This is a dumber and singleton version of a regular Market, this class only contains data contained in a Market but has none of its logic.
DumbModel
This class contains a copy of some elements of the Model contained on the Server, each element is updated thanks to the Renderable sent by the Server and each element is rendered graphically either on CLI or GUI
DumbPersonalBoard
This is a dumber version of a regular PersonalBoard, this class contains data contained in a PersonalBoard but has none of its logic.
DumbProduceLeaderCard
This is a dumber version of a regular ProduceLeaderCard, this class only contains the data stored in a ProduceLeaderCard but has none of its logic.
DumbResourceManager
This is a dumber version of a regular ResourceManager, this class only contains data contained in a ResourceManager but has none of its logic.
DumbSinglePlayerFaithTrack
This is a dumber version of a regular SinglePlayerFaithTrack, this class only contains data contained in a SinglePlayerFaithTrack but has none of its logic.
DumbStoreLeaderCard
This is a dumber version of a regular StoreLeaderCard, this class only contains the data stored in a StoreLeaderCard but has none of its logic.
EndTurnAction
This class represents the action of ending a Player's turn.
EndTurnActionTest  
ErrorMessage
Error message created server-side and transmitted client-side via network
ExecutedActions
A set of enums in which each entry represents an action that can be chosen by a Player
ExitRequestMessage
This class represents a message sent by the client when he wants to disconnect from the server
FaithTrack
Class representing a standard Faith Track used in a multi-player match.
FaithTrackUpdate
This class contains an update regarding a player's faith track which will be saved in the local DumbModel
FavorStatus
Enum representing the state of a Pope's favor.
FinalScreenController  
FooterController
Abstract class used to represent a footer controller.
FXMLResources
Enum used to locate FXML resource on the disk.
Game
Object representing a Masters of Renaissance match.
GameAction
Abstract representation of an action generated from the game itself as consequence of a certain game state.
GameNotFoundNotification
This class represents a notification which is sent to the user when he tries to reconnect to a game and that exact game is already finished, so the user can't be reconnected to it.
GameStartedNotification
This class represents a notification which is sent when the lobby is completed and therefore the actual game can be started.
GameState
All inheriting classes will handle different game phases by implementing the run method
GameStateUpdate
This class contains an update regarding the state of the game which will be saved in the local DumbModel
GameTest  
GridCoordinates
Utility class created to render the faith crosses at the right place on the faith track grind.
GUI
JavaFX Application which acts as the backbone of the graphical user interface of the game.
HelpException
This Exception is thrown when user wants to see help menu
InGameCommonsController  
InGameOppController
JFX Controller used to handle interaction on an opponent's board.
InGamePersonalController
JavaFX controller for the personal playing Scene.
InputVerifier
This class has the goal of checking that the selected action by the user is valid
InvalidActionException
Exception thrown when a PlayerAction meets a condition which makes it illegal to be executed.
InvalidArgsException
This Excpetion is thrown when user types in a syntactically correct command, with syntactically correct arguments, but still the command is not valid
JFXController
Abstract class representing a JavaFX controller with the addition of a linked GUI Object.
JoinedLobbyNotification
This class represents a notification sent when the client is added to a lobby.
LeaderCard
Card of which each player has 2 of.
LeaderCardAbility
this enumeration represents all the abilities that a leader card can have
LeaderCardRequirements
Data structure created to store and parse the set of resources required to activate a LeaderCard
LeaderCardRequirements.LevelQuantityPair
Utility class created to group the required level and quantity of a specific color development card.
LeaderCardsBroadcastUpdate
This class contains an update regarding another player's leader cards which will be saved in the local DumbModel
LeaderCardsDeck
Deck of leader cards from which each player will draw 4 cards at the beginning of a match.
LeaderCardsDeckTest  
LeaderCardsPrivateUpdate
This class contains an update regarding this player's leader cards which will be saved in the local DumbModel
LeaderCardTest  
Level
this enumeration represents leader cards level
LoadingFooterController
JFX Controller for the loading footer.
Lobby
This class is a Singleton that represents the Game Lobby
LorenzoAction
Class representing a play executed by Lorenzo at the end of a single player game's turn.
LorenzoActionTest  
MainMenuController
JavaFX controller for the main menu.
Market  
MarketMarble
this enumeration represents the market marbles colors
MarketTest
Tests Market class behavior, getMarketMarble is used as platform for integrity checks
MarketUpdate
This class contains an updated version of the Market which will be saved in the local DumbModel
MasterOfRenaissance
This is the main entry-point for the whole project
Message
This interface represents a message sent from the Controller to the client's view
ModelUpdate
This class contains an updated version of the Game which will be saved in the local DumbModel
MultiPlayerGameOutcomeUpdate
This class contains an regarding the outcome of a multiplayer game
NicknameAlreadyInUseNotification
This notification is sent to user when he tries to use a nickname which is already being used in the joined game/lobby
NicknameFooterController
JFX Controller which handles nickname selection.
Notification
This class represent a notification which will be displayed on the user's screen
OnScreenElement
Each enum value represents types of objects which need to be displayed on CLI, each name is pretty self-explanatory
PersonalBoard  
PersonalBoardException
This Exception is used as a gimmick to communicate CLI that it should a personal board
Player
This class represents a Player who is part of a game.
PlayerAction
Class representing player-initiated actions.
PlayerBoardController
Javafx controller class for any player board.
PlayerBroadcastUpdate
This class contains an update regarding another player in the game
PlayerPrivateUpdate
This class contains an update regarding the client who receives it
PlayerSelectionFooterController
JFX Controller for client side lobby size selection.
PlayerTest  
PlayingState  
PregameLeaderCardsChoiceAction
This class represents the action of choosing two LeaderCards at the beginning of the game
PregameLeaderCardsChoiceActionTest  
PregameResourceChoiceAction
This class represents the action of choosing some Resources at the beginning of the game and storing them in the depots
PregameResourceChoiceActionTest  
PrivateRenderable
Renderable items that are get shown only to one player.
ProduceLeaderCard
Leader card which can produce a resource chosen from the player and grants one step on the faith track.
ProduceLeaderCardTest  
ProductionCombo
An element which groups all information needed to start a production.
ProductionComboTest  
ProductionOutput
Class representing the output of any production.
ProductionOutputTest  
QuitException
This exception is thrown when user wants to quit CLI
RemoteView
Class which forwards server-side model updates to the network and submits user-initiated action to the controller.
Renderable
Wrapper class for all model items that are meant to be rendered via GUI / CLI .
Resource
this enumeration represents all possibles type of resources
ResourceBank
Class which "spawns" resources when requested.
ResourceBankTest  
ResourceManager
Class used to handle resource-related actions.
SelectMarblesAction
Class which represents the action of selecting a subset of Market Marbles from the temporarily stored ones.
SelectMarblesActionTest  
SerializedMessage
This class can contain either an action or a message which will be transmitted to the server via the network
Server  
ServerApp  
ServerOfflineUpdate
This class is used by the ClientSocket to warn the UI about the server being offline
SinglePlayerFaithTrack
Class representing a Faith Track used in a single-player match, extends the regular Faith Track Class by handling the Black Cross' behavior.
SinglePlayerGameOutcomeUpdate
This class contains an regarding the outcome of a single player game
StartGameAction
Class which effectively starts the playing phase, executed at the end of all pre-game choices.
StartGameActionTest  
StartNextTurnAction
Class which, when possible, starts the next turn.
StartNextTurnActionTest  
StoreLeaderCard
Leader card which can store up to 2 of a specific resource.
StoreLeaderCardTest
Test StoreLeaderCard behavior.
StrongboxUpdate
This class contains an updated version of a player's strongbox which will be saved in the local DumbModel
TakeFromMarketAction
This class represents the action of taking Resources from the Market
TakeFromMarketActionTest  
UI
Interface used by GUI and CLI in order to have a more generic approach
VictoryPointsElement
Interface representing an element that will get counted during the end of the game leaderboard creation.
WaitingForGameSizeState  
WaitingForPlayersNotification
This class represents a notification sent to the client when he joins an incomplete lobby.
WrongCommandArgsException
This exception is used when user types in existing command, but the passed arguments aren't syntactically correct
WrongCommandException
This exception is thrown when user tries to use a command which doesn't exist
WrongNicknameNotification
This class represents a notification which is sent to the user when he tries to reconnect to a game and that exact game is still running, but there's no reference to a player with the given nickname.
